unnormalised: Hey! Been curious about Ayurveda. Heard good things! Anyone tried it for stress? I'm thinking of checking out a clinic in Kerala, maybe around Onam. Rs. 5000 for a consultation seems reasonable? My friend Priya said it helped her with joint pain. Anyone know good places near Bangalore, like within 50 km? Or Delhi? Maybe after having some yummy Hyderabadi biryani.
